metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21408 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Smarty is a template engine for PHP, facilitating the separation of presentation (HTML/CSS) from application logic. Prior to versions 3.1.43 and 4.0.3, template authors could run restricted static php methods. Users should upgrade to version 3.1.43 or 4.0.3 to receive a patch.

criterions.comment: smarty3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
